params.amount: Amount of tokens transferred to this contract
params.tokenAddress: Address of the ERC777 contract used
params.totalTokensDeposited: Total amount of tokens deposited by the user
params.userAddress: Public address of the user depositing

params.operator: The ERC777 operator calling the send() function
params.userData: bytes sent from the send call

devdoc.title: Deposit logic for the credit system

ReceivedTokens(address,address,uint256,u.notice: This event stores the user that deposited tokens into the contract

tokensReceived(address,address,address,u.notice: Function called by an ERC777 when they send tokens

userdoc.notice: Uses the ERC777 receiver hook to trigger additional logic
